scripts.node-docker-win: docker run -d -w /app -p 127.0.0.1:8081:8081 -p 127.0.0.1:8082:8082 -v %cd%:/app --link wikiedit-monitor-mongo:mongo --name wikiedit-monitor node npm start
scripts.node-docker-nix: docker run -d -w /app -p 127.0.0.1:8081:8081 -p 127.0.0.1:8082:8082 -v $PWD:/app --link wikiedit-monitor-mongo:mongo --name wikiedit-monitor node npm start
scripts.start: npm install --no-bin-links && npm run-script init-mongo && ( node editlog.js & node lookup.js )
